snippet: After years of working together on civil rights and police brutality cases, the Rev. Al Sharpton has cut ties with Sanford A. Rubenstein, a lawyer who has been accused of sexual assault.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column; Rev Al Sharpton cuts ties with Sanford A Rubenstein, lawyer who has been accused of sexual assault by woman who is leading figure in Sharpton's organization--The National Action Network; Sharpton and Rubenstein worked together on civil rights and police brutality cases for the last 17 years.
lead_paragraph: After years of working together on civil rights and police brutality cases, the Rev. Al Sharpton has cut ties with Sanford A. Rubenstein, a lawyer who has been accused of sexual assault.

headline.main: Joined in the Spotlight No More
headline.print_headline: Joined in the Spotlight No More
